Rockdale Magnet Fund

An aerial view of RMSST!
What is the Fund?
Founded in 2007, the Rockdale Magnet Fund is the parent organization “booster club” established to support the students, faculty, staff, and parents of the Rockdale Magnet School for Science and Technology (RMSST) in Conyers, Georgia.

We believe parent involvement should be one of the foundations of the strength of our school.  We are a volunteer organization providing support to our school, which would not be possible without the generous support of our RMSST family. We encourage parents to participate in various events! We look forward to your support and participation!
Students at our annual Fall Ball having a great time!
What Does The Fund Provide?
we're glad you asked! 😁
  • - Research Funds for all students to allow students more freedoms to create meaningful research and not stress over financial restraints.
  • - Financial Support to all clubs, increasing not only academic, but exciting extracurricular opportunities for students!
  • - Event Funding for events such as the annual Monster Dash, Fall Ball, Magnet Movie Night, and many others which are adored by students and remembered forever.
  • - Much, Much More! Seriously, check out all these pictures! Many of these opportunites are made possible by the fund! View our full gallery here.
Class of 2024 student, Jessica Rhee, competed at ISEF in Dallas, Texas! This once-in-a-lifetime experience was greaty supported by the fund.
Starting to see the difference we make?
